EXTRACTED VALUE: Hard and furious paced play from this eighties arcade classic. We would have preferred to have seen a port of the superior NES version though.
A relative disaster. The PC version of the game still comes highly recommended, but steer clear of this console iteration.
The flaws of the game really stand out to make this feel like a lifeless and incomplete experience.
The innovation potential was in the story, though that only provides the setting for the gameplay. Outside of that, itâ€™s pretty basic fare.
One for fans only and should perhaps be avoided by anyone looking for something more.
Bare-bones American football without the entertainment we enjoyed in "NFL Street." [Apr 2008, p.73]
